verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We worship You, almighty God, There is none like You. We worship You, O Prince of Peace, That is all we want to do.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We give You praise, For You are our righteousness. We worship You, almighty God, There is none like You.{/lang-eng}
